seo.loginDescription: Sign in or sign up for an AiToEarn account to start your AI creative journey. Supports Google login and email login.
seo.forgotPasswordDescription: Reset your AiToEarn account password. Enter your email address and we will send you a reset link.

registerSubtitle: Verify your email to complete registration
passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
loginError: Login failed, please try again later
activationEmailSent: Verification code has been sent to your email, please check and enter the code
registerError: Registration failed, please try again later
emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
newPasswordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
confirmPasswordMismatch: The two passwords do not match
clickEmailLinkToReset: Please click the reset link in the email to complete password reset
verificationCodePlaceholder: Please enter the verification code from your email
resetEmailSent: Reset email sent, please check your inbox
termsText: By continuing, you agree to our
